author: DANIEL ZELTER
subject: Re: Lupin live action?
body:
"Has there actually been any news about the live Lupin since this
2 yr. old piece of "news"?"

I guess not. But Cagliostro got mentioned in the newest issue of Gamer's 
Republic as one of the editor's anime vhs/dvd picks of 2000.
